lines.text:
[talking about his penis]
Oh my God! Mr. Jonathan, it IS bigger and better!

[about to rape a gay hairdresser with a curling iron]
I'm gonna give you the thrill of your lifetime, you fuckin' little faggot!

[describing a female customer]
That bitch! She pinched my chin, honey, and she didn't even tip me!

[to the mother of teenage girls who try to seduce him]
Exactly what kind of funny farm are you runnin' here?
